remarks: An ideal is closed under multiplication on the left.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
statement:
idllmulcl.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
idllmulcl.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
idllmulcl.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
idllmulcl $p |- ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) /\ ( A e. I /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( B H A ) e. I ) $.
